item.title: Mazola1 add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "The blood of a goat will shatter a diamond." -- Aristotle

item.title: Mazola1 add a quote by Jared Diamond
item.description: "Perhaps our greatest distinction as a species is our capacity, unique among animals, to make counter-evolutionary choices." -- Jared Diamond

item.title: Mazola1 add a quote by Sigmund Freud
item.description: "Religion is an illusion and it derives its strength from the fact that it falls in with our instinctual desires." -- Sigmund Freud

item.title: Mazola1 add a quote by Stephen Hawking
item.description: "Even if there is only one possible unified theory, it is just a set of rules and equations. What is it that breathes fire into the equations and makes a universe for them to describe? The usual approach of science of constructing a mathematical model cannot answer the questions of why there should be a universe for the model to describe. Why does the universe go to all the bother of existing?" -- Stephen Hawking

item.title: Mazola1 add a quote by Søren Kierkegaard
item.description: "Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards." -- Søren Kierkegaard

item.title: Mazola1 add a quote by Marie Curie
item.description: "Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less." -- Marie Curie

item.title: Mazola1 add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional." -- haruki murakami
